name: Hallucination
description:
One day, a young man decided to move to a new home. There he finds a suitcase ... Opening it, he sees the paper and doll. The established rules on the sheet, the guy refuses to perform, but that will soon make him believe in the fact that the doll is alive ...

Survive 8 hours[2 hard minutes]
Touch TV to scare monster

Green bar - Infect status. If you haven't green colour, press F.

When bottom bar has full value press F to subtract your infect.
